message.raw: Tab initialisation now takes an optional keyword argument 'restart', which will be True if __init__ was called from the restart function, and False otherwise. This is so that initialisation can be different depending on whether its a fresh start or not.
message.html: Tab initialisation now takes an optional keyword argument 'restart', which will be True if init was called from the restart function, and False otherwise. This is so that initialisation can be different depending on whether its a fresh start or not.
